sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO Currencies (Name, IsoCode, ExchRate, LastUpdate, CurrencyPrecision) VALUES (#currencyName#, #isoName#, #exchangeRate#, CURTIME (), #currencyPrecision#);
sqlMap.select: SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, Name as currencyName, IsoCode as isoName, ExchRate as exchangeRate, LastUpdate as lastUpdate, CASE WHEN DefaultCurrencyId IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsDefault, CurrencyPrecision FROM Currencies LEFT OUTER JOIN AppSettings ON Currencies.CurrencyId = AppSettings.DefaultCurrencyId ORDER BY IsoCode
SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, Name as currencyName, IsoCode as isoName, ExchRate as exchangeRate, LastUpdate as lastUpdate, CurrencyPrecision FROM Currencies WHERE IsoCode = #value#
SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, Name as currencyName, IsoCode as isoName, ExchRate as exchangeRate, LastUpdate as lastUpdate, CurrencyPrecision FROM Currencies WHERE CurrencyID = #value#
SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, Name as currencyName, IsoCode as isoName, ExchRate as exchangeRate, LastUpdate as lastUpdate, CurrencyPrecision FROM Currencies WHERE Name = #value#

SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, Name as currencyName, IsoCode as isoName, ExchRate as exchangeRate, LastUpdate as lastUpdate, CurrencyPrecision FROM Currencies c INNER JOIN AppSettings a on c.currencyid = a.defaultcurrencyid
SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, MethodName as methodName, MethodUrl as methodUrl, MethodPath as methodPath FROM CurrencyMethods WHERE CurrencyID = #currencyID#
SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, MethodName as methodName, MethodUrl as methodUrl, MethodPath as methodPath FROM CurrencyMethods;
SELECT CurrencyID as currencyID, MethodName as methodName, MethodUrl as methodUrl, MethodPath as methodPath FROM CurrencyMethods WHERE CurrencyID = #currencyID# and MethodName = #methodName#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CurrencyMethods ( CurrencyID, MethodName, MethodUrl, MethodPath ) VALUES ( #currencyID#, #methodName#, #methodUrl#, #methodPath# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Currencies SET EXCHRATE = #exchangeRate#, LASTUPDATE = #lastUpdate# WHERE CurrencyID = #currencyID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CURRENCYMETHODS WHERE MethodName = #methodName# AND CurrencyID = #currencyID#;
